paragraphs: Fukuoka is a lively city ir its mix of history, modern charm, and delicious food. With parks, ancient temples, and famous ramen, its a perfect place to relax and explore.

Okinawa is a tropical paradise in southern Japan, known for its stunning beaches, vibrant coral reefs, and rich cultural heritage. With beautiful islands, traditional Ryukyuan castles, and unique cuisine, itâ€™s a perfect place to relax and explore.
Living in this city was one of the best periods in my life, it was fun nearly ever day, I met so many wonderfull people, If I ever return here, I'd no doubt feel at home.
